metadata.title: CVE-2023-1227 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Core in Google Chrome on Lacros prior to 111.0.5563.64allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UIinteraction to potentially exploit heap corruption via crafted UIinteraction. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
